Name: Hex Picross
About the game: Beautiful minimalist design and a relaxing atmosphere Hex Picross was assembled with a beautiful and relaxing minimalist design Made with relaxing visual and sound effects In addition to music prepared exclusively How to play You need to click on the hexagonal cells to make them colored Each diagonal and column counts how many colored cells there are Your challenge is to find all the intersections between columns and diagonals With this, they will decrease their number and will be equal to zero. When all are equal to zero, you've won the game. Many Difficulty Levels 7x3 - 40 Levels 9x4 - 40 Levels 13x6 - 40 Levels 17x8 - 40 Levels 25x12 - 40 Levels 33x16 - 40 Levels Resources Minimalist: no timer and no pressure, solve puzzles in your own time Premium: 240 carefully chosen levels Zen: Zen and relaxing sound environment Dark Mode: Perfect if you can't stare at the white screen for too long Steam Cloud and Steam Achivements
